Events that occurred on 27 September.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1920 - Voice actor William Conrad is born.
1936 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Professor A. Pompen.
1980 - Oxonmoot 1980 at The Turf Tavern.
1981 - Oxonmoot 1981 at The Turf Tavern.
1985 - Oxonmoot 1985 at Oxford Town Hall.
1987 - Oxonmoot 1987 at Oxford Town Hall.
1996 - Realms of Tolkien is published.
1998 - Oxonmoot 1998 at Exeter College.
2004 - Parma Eldalamberon issue 15 is published.
2008 - Oxonmoot 2008 at Christ Church.
2009 - Oxonmoot 2009 at Lady Margaret Hall.
2011 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard expansion is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and his companions spend the second night with Tom Bombadil because of the rain. While discussing with him about the One Ring, Frodo wears it for first time.
Gandalf crosses Greyflood.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
New moon[1]
